ayas.translation: A questioner questioned concerning the doom about to fall

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

ayas.translation: Upon the disbelievers, which none can repel,
From Allah, Lord of the Ascending Stairways

ayas.arabic: تَعْرُجُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
ayas.translation: (Whereby) the angels and the Spirit ascend unto Him in a Day whereof the span is fifty thousand years.
ayas.transliteration: ta`rujul malā-ikatu war rūḥu ilayhi fī yawmin kāna miqdāruhu khamsīna alfa sanah

ayas.translation: But be patient (O Muhammad) with a patience fair to see.
Lo! they behold it afar off
While we behold it nigh:
The day when the sky will become as molten copper,
And the hills become as flakes of wool,
And no familiar friend will ask a question of his friend

ayas.arabic: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍۭ بِبَنِيهِ
ayas.translation: Though they will be given sight of them. The guilty man will long to be able to ransom himself from the punishment of that day at the price of his children
ayas.transliteration: yubaṣṣarūnahum ۚ yawaddul mujrimu law yaftadī min `adhābi yawmi-idhin bibanīh

ayas.translation: And his spouse and his brother
And his kin that harboured him

ayas.arabic: وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
ayas.translation: And all that are in the earth, if then it might deliver him.
ayas.transliteration: wa man fil-arḍi jamī`an thumma yunjīh

ayas.translation: But nay! for lo! it is the fire of hell
Eager to roast;
It calleth him who turned and fled (from truth),
And hoarded (wealth) and withheld it.
Lo! man was created anxious,
Fretful when evil befalleth him
And, when good befalleth him, grudging;
Save worshippers.
Who are constant at their worship
And in whose wealth there is a right acknowledged
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna fī amwālihim ḥaqqun ma`lūm

ayas.translation: For the beggar and the destitute;
And those who believe in the Day of Judgment,

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
ayas.translation: And those who are fearful of their Lord's doom -
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna hum min `adhābi rabbihim mushfiqūn

ayas.translation: Lo! the doom of their Lord is that before which none can feel secure -
And those who preserve their chastity

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
ayas.translation: Save with their wives and those whom their right hands possess, for thus they are not blameworthy;
ayas.transliteration: illā `alā azwājihim aw mā malakat aymānuhum fa-innahum ghayru malūmīn

ayas.arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
ayas.translation: But whoso seeketh more than that, those are they who are transgressors;
And those who keep their pledges and their covenant,
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna hum li-amānātihim wa`ahdihim rā`ūn

ayas.translation: And those who stand by their testimony
And those who are attentive at their worship.
These will dwell in Gardens, honoured.
What aileth those who disbelieve, that they keep staring toward thee (O Muhammad), open-eyed,
On the right and on the left, in groups?

ayas.arabic: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Doth every man among them hope to enter the Garden of Delight?
ayas.transliteration: ayaṭma`u kullum-ri-in minhum an yudkhala jannata na`īm

ayas.translation: Nay, verily. Lo! We created them from what they know.

ayas.arabic: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ وَٱلْمَغَـٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
ayas.translation: But nay! I swear by the Lord of the rising-places and the setting-places of the planets that We verily are Able
ayas.transliteration: falā uqsimu birabbil mashāriqi wal maghāribi innā laqādirūn

ayas.arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
ayas.translation: To replace them by (others) better than them. And we are not to be outrun.
ayas.transliteration: `alā an nubaddila khayran minhum wa mā naḥnu bimasbūqīn

ayas.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
ayas.translation: So let them chat and play until they meet their Day which they are promised,
ayas.transliteration: fadharhum yakhūḍū wayal`abū ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumul ladhī yū`adūn

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
ayas.translation: The day when they come forth from the graves in haste, as racing to a goal,
ayas.transliteration: yawma yakhrujūna minal-ajdāthi sirā`an ka-annahum ilā nuṣubiy yūfiḍūn

ayas.arabic: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
ayas.translation: With eyes aghast, abasement stupefying them: Such is the Day which they are promised.
ayas.transliteration: khāshi`atan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum dhillah ۚ dhālikal yawmul ladhī kānū yū`adūn
